name: x-sp-atk
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Raises the target’s Special Attack by one stage. Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
short_effect: Raises Special Attack by one stage in battle. Raises happiness.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Raises the stat SP. ATK during one battle.
flavor_text.emerald: Raises the stat SP. ATK during one battle.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Raises the SP. ATK stat of POKéMON in battle. Wears off if the POKéMON is withdrawn.
